name: AVAudioSession.StereoOrientation
desc: Constants that define the supported stereo orientations.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The audio session isnâ€™t configured for stereo recording.

items.name: case portrait
items.desc: Audio capture should be vertically oriented, with the lightning connector on the bottom.

items.name: case portraitUpsideDown
items.desc: Audio capture should be vertically oriented, with the lightning connector on the top.

items.name: case landscapeLeft
items.desc: Audio capture should be horizontally oriented, with the lightning connector on the left.

items.name: case landscapeRight
items.desc: Audio capture should be horizontally oriented, with the lightning connector on the right.
